title: March 31, 2024 - Israel-Hamas war
description: Fierce fighting is taking place across Gaza, where Palestinians face catastrophic levels of hunger due to Israel's throttling of aid during its campaign against Hamas.
author: By Joshua Berlinger, Antoinette Radford and Maureen Chowdhury

title: Devastation in Gaza as Israel wages war on Hamas
description: Iran accused Israel of killing two top commanders and five others in an airstrike on its consulate in Damascus, Syria. Follow for live updates.  Follow for live updates.
author: By Jessie Yeung, Antoinette Radford, Maureen Chowdhury, Elise Hammond and Aditi Sangal

title: What April Foolsâ€™ Day looks like around the world
description: The Scottish used to call it Huntigowk Day. The French use it as an excuse to prank people with fish. Iranians have a version tied to ancient customs. It seems nearly every culture is united by a desire to pull some silly, goofy tricks.
author: AJ Willingham
